newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse closes almost unchanged.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse closes almost unchanged.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange on Thursday closed almost unchanged on lower volume, bourse sources said.
The market's 29-share index closed at 612.63 from 612.43 on Wednesday.
Trade volume was 292,410 dinars against 3.1 million dinars.
Banque du Sud rose 2.97 percent to 30.16 dinars and UIB bank 1.1 percent to 13.75 dinars.
Retail stores Monoprix fell 2.99 percent to 45.59 dinars and STB bank also fell 2.99 percent too to 21.68 dinars. ($=0.96 dinar)
